title: Comment on SI nails it: â€œLouisville created and continues to nurture dangerous culture for womenâ€ by Bourbon Breath
text:
Article written by Mrs. Tyler Thompson No, I will not make you a sandwich, but you can follow me on Twitter @MrsTylerKSR or email me . 72 responses to â€œSI nails it: â€œLouisville created and continues to nurture dangerous culture for womenâ€â€ Irwin R. Fletcher October 9, 2015 at 11:22 am | Permalink | Reply 
Excellent article. Likely too high concept for much of the audience. somerset bill October 9, 2015 at 11:31 am | Permalink | Reply 
donâ€™t see how rick can survive that headline. XmasinOctober October 9, 2015 at 11:33 am | Permalink | Reply 
What about seeking out Devonte Fields and offering him a scholarship after he punched his girlfriend? What is interesting and fairly sad is that UL has many professors, students and season ticket holders that are women, mothers daughters etc and they donâ€™t really seem to care. Where is their outrage? When does a fanbase, faculty or student body reach the point of taking a stand? Cat's Other Paw October 9, 2015 at 11:56 am | Permalink 
This is an excellent point about Devonte Fields. Moreover, Iâ€™d be interested in all of the football and basketball players who have transferred in or permitted to remain enrolled at Louisville after committing sexual and/or violent offenses against females during the reign of Jurich. Ultimately, it matters none. Pitino will be regarded a legend for winning national championships at multiple schools, Petrino is invincible, and Jurich will be bolting soon to Texas (or somewhere similar) where he will make three times the salary he currently makes. The NCAA punishes student-athletes and schools, never coaches or administrators. J-Dub421 October 9, 2015 at 12:11 pm | Permalink 
Donâ€™t forget that Petrino pulled the scholarship offer that nice kid from South Carolina (I think it was South Carolina), for Fields the day before signing day. Aaron cathcart October 9, 2015 at 12:59 pm | Permalink 
very good point Louisville Student October 9, 2015 at 12:00   
This is absolutely absurd. There are a few despicable acts that have taken place in the athletic department, but for SI to title this story â€œLouisville created and continues to nurture dangerous culture for womenâ€ is absolutely absurd and completely misleading. In fact, The University of Louisville is by far ranked the safest major University in the stateâ€” A ranking in which UK only ranks ahead of UPike and Kentucky State. 
And for youâ€¦ Iâ€™m absolutely disgusted how humored and entertained you are by this whole situation. 
â€œItâ€™s only 104 pages, and although it can be hard to read at times, the parts about Katina and her girls going to the UofL dorm make it a page-turner. 
E-book: $9.99 on Amazon Butter Lovers Microwave Popcorn: $3.98/12-packâ€ 
â€œif taking joy in this makes you a bad person, weâ€™ll party in hell together.â€ 
Iâ€™M GLAD YOU THINK A GROWN WOMEN SOLICITING HER UNDERAGE DAUGHTERS FOR PROSTITUTION IS FUNNY. 
You are clearly a hypocrite and care nothing more than to bash Louisville and get as much entertainment as you can from such a terrible situation. This is much bigger than sports or a rivalry. 
You have no class, and Iâ€™m sickened by you finding this entertaining. Enjoy burning in hell. Mrs. Tyler Thompson October 9, 2015 at 12:03 pm | Permalink 
You can take your anger about all of this out on me, but I didnâ€™t write the Sports Illustrated piece. Also feel free to keep using KSR as an outlet for your pain, we appreciate your patronage! J-Dub421 October 9, 2015 at 12:14 pm | Permalink 
Get off your high horse Louisville student. If this were happening at UK Louisville fans would be delighting in it. All Iâ€™ve heard for the last 6 years are that Cal is a cheater and UKâ€™s banners will come down. Well, now the shoe is on the other foot. danny October 9, 2015 at 12:22 pm | Permalink 
there is no sense trying to talk sense into these hypocritical UK fans. The writers of this page pander to the willful ignorance of the UK fanbase who will gobble up piss in their cheerios if matt jones pours it in there. And then tell you how delicious it is. When i come to this page the thought that crosses my mind prior to doing so is, â€œi wonder what these bigots/assholes are talking about todayâ€ 
its sad but true, whether drew and tyler believe what they put in print is neither here nor there. the fact that they print it, knowing that it appeals to backward thinking racist rednecks who will lap up anything they say, just to make money and a name for their website is truly disgusting. 
and another thing, IT IS KSR. not LSR. they bash UL fans for caring about UK, but none of our major blogs give them any coverage. maybe once a month. even in a down time of year, there is at least one mention of UL in a negative light on the first page whenever i check the sight out. talk about insecurity. maybe you wouldnâ€™t be so insecure if you had more than basketball to cheer about CATandMONKEY October 9, 2015 at 12:22 pm | Permalink 
Louisville student: Save your energy for exams. Your outrage should be directed towards the perpetrators of these acts, not the media outlets that choose to report/comment on such ridiculous travesties. 
As a UofL undergraduate alum I am ashamed and embarrassed by the decisions of the athletic department and administration over the past 10 -15 years. The chemistry, biology and math departments were great for my education and career but unfortunately none will see a penny of donation money from me as long as the current administration and athletic leadership remains in place. 
Please be certain to voice your displeasure on SI.com. CATandMONKEY October 9, 2015 at 12:24 pm | Permalink 
Danny, yet here you are. Louisville Student October 9, 2015 at 12:25 pm | Permalink 
Youâ€™re a disgusting human. It has nothing to do with SI. You have let a college sports rivalry and an entry-level journalism job at KSR get to youâ€™re head. October 9, 2015 at 12:38 pm | Permalink 
*your Parvenu October 9, 2015 at 12:29 pm | Permalink 
â€œEnjoy burning in hellâ€? What a terrible close to your post. It basically undermines everything else you had to say. Terrible. UK Student October 9, 2015 at 12:30 pm | Permalink 
^^ *your Angela October 9, 2015 at 12:32 pm | Permalink 
You Card fans are so stupid that you think the act of making fun of the athletics program at UL is worse than the act itself. Please get over yourselves. In the grand scheme of things, it doesnâ€™t matter if the girls were 17 3/4 years old or 18 years old. Focus on the fact that the â€œwin at all costsâ€ mentality at UL really does have costs. The cost in this case is hookers in the basketball dorms, and the crushing NCAA penalties forthcoming. Your athletics department is a dumpster fire and it has nothing to do with how everyone, including UK fans, saw it coming and are now laughing at you. theSkinny81 October 9, 2015 at 12:33 pm | Permalink 
Hey, Louisville Student and danny, hereâ€™s an idea you might want to pass on to your Athletics Dept.: 
STOP. F*CKING. UP. 
Then none of this would happen. 
Donâ€™t thank me. Pay it forward. ğŸ˜‰ CardFan502 October 9, 2015 at 12:37 pm | Permalink 
If is had happen at YewKay to U all,I know Iâ€™d be sending evry Cayut fan I seen a get well card. I know all my fellow fans would do the same. CardFan502 October 9, 2015 at 12:37 pm | Permalink 
No way would we make fun a something like this. Louisville Student October 9, 2015 at 12:41 pm | Permalink 
mood UKBigDaddy4 October 9, 2015 at 12:41 pm | Permalink 
Iâ€™m interested in hearing your defense of your position. You say that the headline is misleadingâ€¦in what way? The author of this article clearly indicates that the issue is the culture and mentality that has become increasingly prevalent in college athletics. He also argues that the manner in which UL has conducted itself over the past decade plus does nothing but encourage that mentality. Thatâ€™s a hard argument to refute. And no one is delighting in the fact that this horrible woman pimped out her daughters, or that grown men would condone and pay for such thingsâ€¦itâ€™s sickening. What is entertaining is the irrational portion of your fan base(there are plenty of rational ones as well) that continues to somehow try to spin this situation or muddy the waters; or worse yet, continue to throw out â€˜these are just allegations from an untrustworthy sourceâ€™ arguments. What is entertaining is that we joke about the lack of class, etc in the UL administration often, and now those jokes are being shown to, in fact, be true! Itâ€™s equal parts sadness in seeing innocent people get abused, and hilarity because of UL fansâ€™ continued attempts to just look the other way! Louisville Student October 9, 2015 at 12:41 pm | Permalink 
Parvenuâ€¦ Sheâ€™s the one who wrote the words â€œâ€œif taking joy in this makes you a bad person, weâ€™ll party in hell together.â€ Louisville Student October 9, 2015 at 12:54 pm | Permalink 
UKBigDaddy4â€”- I have no defense for the allegations. They are sick and Iâ€™m disgusted. I have no issue with the content in the SI article, itâ€™s the absurdly misleading headline that bothered me, and the fact that this immature cretin who wrote this article is finding humor in this absurdly sick situation. 
Iâ€™ve said it before and Iâ€™ll say it again. This is much bigger than sports or a rivalry. 
Bozo who wrote this articleâ€” Worry more about the very serious message Iâ€™m trying to send your sick mind, and less about my grammar. Ha! October 9, 2015 at 1:01 pm | Permalink 
It is disgusting sick situation, UL Student. 
Maybe your program shouldnâ€™t have gotten involved in it? ğŸ˜‰ RICK October 9, 2015 at 1:01 pm | Permalink 
louisville student, I know you are really Rick Pitino so stop lying and call one of your hooker friends. Louisville Student October 9, 2015 at 1:02 pm | Permalink 
Iâ€™m Self-Destructing. Youâ€™ve ruined my life! BigBlue37 October 9, 2015 at 1:05 pm | Permalink 
Wasnâ€™t it the UofL fan base that was yuking it up at UK when Nerlens Noel fractured his leg? Yeah, you guys are just the epitome of a classy fan base. F*ck off Louisville Student, and Danny. Weâ€™re laughing at you because you guys are getting what you deserve. I hope your entire sports program burns in hell. Ha! October 9, 2015 at 1:06 pm | Permalink 
BigBlue37 pretty much nailed it. 
Sorry not sorry. James October 9, 2015 at 1:21 pm | Permalink 
Louisville student must be a Tard athlete since he spells about as well as Anus Mohamed handles his balls in the paint. 
Question of the day is: Is Anus in on this brothel pull U of Lol student? 
L1C4nication Gooseman21 October 9, 2015 at 1:22 pm | Permalink 
ULStudent-What kind of message do you think it sends to the fans, faculty, students, and athletes when you do not punish your head bb coach when he has a major sex scandal that involves sex in a restaurant, abortion or at the very least money payment to the women, a FBI investigation ect. Then you rehire a football coach that basically took a dump on your program when he left and then had his own sex scandal where he lied to the police and the school. Arkansas then fired him. IMO, and everybodyâ€™s got one, it tells people that your school doesnâ€™t care how you treat women and that culture has trickled down to the players. I agree with you that it is terrible that underage girls were involved. Louisville has made their bed and now that they will have to sleep in it. WatchinginCali October 9, 2015 at 1:25 pm | Permalink 
What is sad is that the UL fan base is standing around supporting any of these clowns. If this happened anywhere on a college campus â€“ administration, academic departments, medical schools â€“ the entirety of the staff and faculty would be summarily dismissed. With no questions asked. 
The only thing that makes this an issue is the money associated with the program and the overall winning percentage of Pitino. That is the very definition of win at all costs. 
You admitted yourself that the whole thing is disturbing and disgusting. All you need to do now is take the other step and realize that there HAS to be a change in personnel or you will have (unwittingly) reinforced the behavior. Thatâ€™s it. You either care about the morally-corrupt behaviors, the lives that were impacted and the illegal nature of what was going on in your athletic department or you donâ€™t. There is no in-between. And the decision to support a coach and AD that allowed this to happen places you squarely in the latter. yarg October 9, 2015 at 12:14   
Iâ€™m not going to go as far as â€œburn in hellâ€ dude, but it probably is about time to step back and stop the â€œtee-hee look how embarrassing this is for ULâ€ and recognize that there are real human beings in this story. Itâ€™s bizarre and ugly and goes much deeper than a college sports rivalry. Louisville Student October 9, 2015 at 12:31 pm | Permalink 
I only said burn in hell because in one of her other articles about this, she says â€œif taking joy in this makes you a bad person, weâ€™ll party in hell together.â€ 
Iâ€™m glad there seems to be someone on this backward thinking POS website who at least agrees this isnâ€™t funny though. EKU Student October 9, 2015 at 1:06 pm | Permalink 
I wish I had a â€œbackward thinking POS websiteâ€ that made so many UL fans angry and made so much money. Go back to class. Or to the dorm for some Laser Tag. Booby Petrino October 9, 2015 at 1:33 pm | Permalink 
Lol Louisville student is more worried about what KSR posts than they are about what disgusting things theyâ€™re school is responsible for. Classic Tard! Sweating this site to give your opinion that mostly everyone here is laughing at, while lining the pockets of those you are disgusted by. More comments + more clicks = more money for Matt and the rest of the crew that you want to burn. Oh goodness, the idiocy of Louisville fans knows no depths. GroundControlToNumber9 October 9, 2015 at 12:16   
This narrative is overkill and unsubstantiatedâ€¦ 
None of the women involved with the coaches previous decisions or players were put in dangerous situations from the details that have been presented. Well, other than Petrino wrecking a motorcycleâ€¦ but thatâ€™s transportation choices and not part of the narrative being attempt here. 
Media uses the word â€˜dangerousâ€™ in this situation to sell tickets to the show (that includes you Tyler by quoting it). 
The women: 
â€”â€“ Pitinoâ€™s Affiar: â€¦..Karen Sypher â€“ An adult who chose to â€˜play for payâ€™â€¦..Pitinoâ€™s wife â€“ An adult who was cheated on. We donâ€™t know the full story here so Iâ€™ll leave it at that. 
â€”â€“ Petrinoâ€™s Affiar: â€¦..Jessica Dorrell â€“ The girlfriend climbing the ladder in the UA athletics departmentâ€¦..Petrinoâ€™s wife â€“ An adult who was cheated on. We donâ€™t know the full story here so Iâ€™ll leave it at that. 
â€”â€“ Breaking Cardinal Rules: â€¦..Katina Powell â€“ An adult who sold a service and enjoyed the power it gave her. Made money off story.â€¦..Daughter 1 â€“ An Adult. Mom brought them into the â€˜be with basketball starsâ€™&â€˜even get paid to do itâ€™ dreamâ€¦..Daughter 2 â€“ An Adult. Mom brought them into the â€˜be with basketball starsâ€™&â€˜even get paid to do itâ€™ dreamâ€¦..Daughter 3 â€“ Underage. Mom brought them into the â€˜be with basketball starsâ€™&â€˜even get paid to do itâ€™ dream. 
â€“ 
Louisville Basketball is culpable for a program â€˜out of controlâ€™ regardless of if Pitino had any knowledge of â€˜paid girls for playersâ€™. But the â€˜dangerousâ€™ bit is unproven as is the â€˜continues toâ€™ line in the SI sentence. 
By putting her children in a situation where money was exchanged with an underage girl will likely put Katina Powell in jail (regardless of the justification, â€œthese are the guys my girls wanted to be with and I encouraged and facilitated their connecting under the premise they were the most popular athletes in town and had the most potential (in regards to guys my girls could get the attention of) to be wealthy some dayâ€). 
If anything the SI title should be (click bait cleaned): Louisville had a program that was out of control and broken the law with women who arenâ€™t concerned about it. papasnapper October 9, 2015 at 1:38 pm | Permalink 
I think youâ€™ve missed the point. He is questioning the culture of teaching young men that women are only objects to be played with and dismissed. NOT what I would teach my children or grandchildren, nor want them to be taught while under another adultâ€™s guidance. Booby Petrino October 9, 2015 at 1:41 pm | Permalink 
overkill and unsubstantiated? It is dangerous for women when men in powerful positions (ie coaches who young men look up to) teach young men that women are nothing more than sex objects. Rick, Bobby, and even Jurich are men of power and have done nothing to show that they respect women, and have only done the opposite. It is extremely dangerous. Rape and abuse of women come from men who werenâ€™t taught to respect women. It comes from men who were shown that women are nothing but objects for them to control. One women even lost her job at UofL for speaking out against that culture. But hey, it wasnâ€™t your job so letâ€™s just call it overkill for her to be upset about that. So your headline â€œLouisville had a program that was out of control and broken the law with women who arenâ€™t concerned about itâ€ does not apply to all women discussed in the article. She cared, and she lost her job. Poppschmidty October 9, 2015 at 12:17   
Weâ€™ve had this a week nowâ€¦itâ€™s not our (THE BBNâ€™s) problem. I will say that all the talk is about Pitino, but it may be time to look higher up than him at Jurich. Sad state of college athletics right now. Stay classy, my friends. GroundControlToNumber9 October 9, 2015 at 12:20   
By the way Iâ€™m a Kentucky Wildcat fan who isnâ€™t about piling onâ€¦ 
even though the L1C4nicate line is gold. Rixter October 9, 2015 at 12:27   
â€œI donâ€™t know what resigning would accomplish,â€ Pitino said. â€œI think thatâ€™s the cowardly way out â€” if I resign now and without coaching two fifth-year seniors and the people who came to play for me. What does it do for the program if the head coach just runs away? 
Wasnâ€™t Jeff Sheppard a 5th year senor on the 1997-98 tea tat Pitino resigned from?? GatorCat October 9, 2015 at 12:44 pm | Permalink 
Pitino says â€œfifth-year seniorsâ€ as if those guys had been part of the program for their entire collegiate career (as Sheppard was), when they are actually graduate transfers playing one final year of eligibility at UL. Just like Mulder and Uncle Julius at UK â€“ could be great guys â€“ but not like heâ€™s finishing a long relationship with them. RICK October 9, 2015 at 12:35   
I remember 15 years ago or so when Louisville hired Pitino the fans would post GOT PITINO, I think the GOT MILK slogan was popular back then . I am so glad they have GOT PITINO. WatchinginCali October 9, 2015 at 1:18 pm | Permalink 
At this point, isnâ€™t GOT PITINO more of an admission that you have contracted something awful than anything else? As inâ€¦â€I GOT the clapâ€ or â€œOh, Heâ€™s GOT HIVâ€. He is a the sexual scandal disease that keeps givingâ€¦and UL is the host that doesnâ€™t know that it isnâ€™t normal for their pee to burn. Bluegrassstu October 9, 2015 at 12:35   
Both Pitino and Petrino should not be allowed to coach. Both have committed immoral sex deeds, if my children were offered scholarships to play sports for either coach, I would not allow it. In my opinion Jurich and Ramsey are desperate to be relevant on the major college sport scene. UKBlue1! October 9, 2015 at 12:52 pm | Permalink 
â€œBoth have committed immoral sex deedsâ€. This is a reflection of our society. Most donâ€™t understand the concept of â€œimmoral sex deedâ€ any longer. Bobbum man October 9, 2015 at 12:43   
These UL fans are absolutely priceless, Iâ€™ve never seen a more dillusional fan base in my life. Now that we all but know the allegations to be true they try to spin it around on us with things like â€œthese are actual humans involvedâ€ and how we shouldnâ€™t be taking joy in it. What an absolute croc of s***. You guys would be eating this up if it were UK. As for the women, yes if she prositutued her Underage kids thatâ€™s a different issue and I highly doubt anyone is laughing at that aspect of The story. What I find funny is that you guys still donâ€™t have any issue with ur university, with ur continued lack of care for decent people as leaders and players. But yet you are suprised something like this happened, and that no way Rick could possibly know. The article hit the nail on the head, you guys created this culture, pitino and Petrino, all the thugs kicked out of various schools for various rules/crimes. Itâ€™s not all some big coincedence, U put winning at all costs as the most important thing of ur program and it did well for a few years U became relevant in football and basketball again, and we all know about ur rifle shooting dominance. But it was only a matter of time with the jurich/pitino/Petrino dream team that it all came crashing down. Whatâ€™s astonishing is that they all come out publicly supporting one another immediately instead of looking into these issues and why theyâ€™re happening. Itâ€™s comin crashing down cards and while I wish the best for that ladies children, in my opinion ur university 100% deserves a severe punishment and deserves every bit of it. #BringDownTheBanner CC4UK
